channel.title: How do i
channel.description:
ok i'm looking on how to make it where donators don't need runes to cast spells. so i have 3 donator ranks, is 1 2 and 3, how would i make it where they don't need runes to cast spells. ex: veng, barrage, blitz.
revision: 317 loading 602/634 source: TrisdiaxV2 Request: read above.

item.title: How do i
item.dc:creator: @hotkid8200 hotkid8200
item.description:
@hotkid8200 wrote:

this didn’t come close to working. but thanks for offering me help:D

Read full topic

item.title: How do i
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

if player is donator: c.startAnimation(4411); q.gfx100(725);//Just use c.gfx100 q.vengOn = true; addSkillXP(2000, 6); c.turnPlayerTo(oX,oY); refreshSkill(6); c.getCombat().resetPlayerAttack(); c.stopMovement(); c.lastCast = System.currentTimeMillis(); else c.startAnimation(4411); q.gfx100(725);//Just use c.gfx100 c.getItems().deleteItem2(9075, 3); c.getItems().deleteItem2(557, 10);//For these you need to change to deleteItem(item, itemslot, amount);. c.getItems().deleteItem2(560, 2); q.vengOn = true; addSkillXP(2000, 6); c.turnPlayerTo(oX,oY); refreshSkill(6); c.getCombat().resetPlayerAttack(); c.stopMovement(); c.lastCast = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

that gives the general idea?

Read full topic

item.title: How do i
item.dc:creator: @hotkid8200 hotkid8200
item.description:
@hotkid8200 wrote:

found this in playerassistant.java

c.startAnimation(4411); q.gfx100(725);//Just use c.gfx100 c.getItems().deleteItem2(9075, 3); c.getItems().deleteItem2(557, 10);//For these you need to change to deleteItem(item, itemslot, amount);. c.getItems().deleteItem2(560, 2); q.vengOn = true; addSkillXP(2000, 6); c.turnPlayerTo(oX,oY); refreshSkill(6); c.getCombat().resetPlayerAttack(); c.stopMovement(); c.lastCast = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

Read full topic

item.title: How do i
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

easy peasy, get the action button for each spell,
then (this isnt going to be described the best, im tiered, its the weekend.)

Actionbutton:
if player = donater tele them
else getitems (casting runes) then tele them

you understand?

best thing to do is to search the ::mypos for each tele if you dont see action button when clicking the skill

Read full topic
